1.name: CueSongs
1.description: This is the e-commerce website which I did design & maintenance on whilst I worked at CueSongs.

2.name: Forbidden Codes
2.description: This is a collection of artwork that I completed for a various artists compilation on a record label called 117 Records.

3.name: 7 Per Cent
3.description: This is a small one page website that I designed & implemented for fun, that loaded random design inspiration websites on click of the main button/emblem.

4.name: Science HKI
4.description: This is some artwork I designed (using my own photography) for an edition of a podcast series that I was featuring on.

5.name: Storylines
5.description: This is some artwork (using my own photography) that I've designed for an EP of mine that will be coming out soon on a record label called Skeleton Recordings.

6.name: Special Projects
6.description: This is artwork done for an album release that was shelved before it went to manufacture.

7.name: Working Title
7.description: This is the digital cover (using my own photography) of a series of free downloads that I was releasing on my SoundCloud page.

8.name: Hex Digital
8.description: This is a website I created for an interview with a digital agency in Dalston that I was applying to intern for.

9.name: Filter Mag
9.description: This is a mock design for a music magazine website, that I was planning on implementing with a group of friends but did not have the time to do so.

10.name: Critical Sound
10.description: This is a concept design done for a various artist compilation on a drum & bass label, but was not used.

11.name: Forbidden Codes (Website)
11.description: This is a promotional splash page I designed for the lead up to a various artist compilation that I had also designed the artwork for.

12.name: 117 Records
12.description: I was tasked with creating a 'style guide' for a newly formed record label called 117 Records & based on the requirements provided by the label owner, this was the outcome.

13.name: Amen Warfare
13.description: This is a set of artwork that I designed for a compilation I was also featuring on. The plans were changed at the last minute and there were no vinyl or CD manufactured for the release, so only the digital art was used.

14.name: Abstractions Presents Rupture
14.description: This is a flyer I designed for a joint night hosted by 2 different promotions, but was never used.

15.name: Simple Technique
15.description: This is a simple promotional art made for an artist I knew at the time.

16.name: Coding Conventions
16.description: This is a simple one page website I made as part of my degree, to educate students on best practices for Java programming.
